Ernst,"2012-01-28T17:01:32.24Z","Mini sportscar, truck and cart, triple fun","

Overall 5 bricks: I bought this great little set as impulse, but no regrets here. These little sets are big fun getting 3 little cars for the price of 1. With just 70 pieces you can built 3 cute cars
column2: or surprise your kid(s) with a great affordable gift. Add the plastic container in which it comes and the 5 bricks are explained.

column1: Building 4 bricks: Lego gives 6-12 years but a smart 5 year old does the
column2: 3 jobs too. But loads of fun for young and old(er).&nbsp

column1: <li>First the Sportscar, a cute little racer with great details namely the moving spoiler and 2 rearview mirrors on the sides.
<li>Second the small cart, again a lovely car with yellow seat and engine. The mirrorparts now being used as exhaustpipes. Only thing you miss is a minifigure as driver.
• Third the little truck, no specifics here but just remarkable that you can built a real truck with almost the same parts as used for both other cars.

Parts 4 bricks: nothing really special except the way you can use 70 normal parts in so much different ways in 1 set. A nice amount of different colored small slopes are valuable in this specific set. If a minifigure was included it would have been 5 bricks.
Playability 5 bricks: like said before, 70 small bricks give great fun building 3 nice vehicles and it is fun playing with each separate car.
